thread.section_title: Golden Hotel Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: The Golden Hotel -
thread.title_full: The Golden Hotel - Review of Golden Hotel Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mike H
title: The Golden Hotel -
text:
The staff, the cleanliness, and the position of the hotel were excellent, however the room we were allocated was very compact, I am six foot and could not sit on the toilet, there was virtually no wardrobe space, for our stay of four nights.
The continental breakfast was adequate, however the seating was at a premium, there were only fourteen covers, so if you were a late riser, you would have to wait for someone to vacate a table to enable you to take a seat.
There were photographs of rooms in the extremely compact lift of generous proportions, but in our party of four couples, we did not see any of them
